thread.section_title: Park Plaza Victoria London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfectly Fine - Unless You Are a Loser
thread.title_full: Perfectly Fine - Unless You Are a Loser - Review of Park Plaza Victoria London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: TheRedEye
title: Perfectly Fine - Unless You Are a Loser
text:
Good convenient location and well appointed rooms as you would expect from this price point.
Health Club with a steam room and a sauna is nicely maintained, and feels surprising luxurious without being pretentious.
Just don't be a loser and order Room Service. Not surprisingly, poor in quality, quantity, and ambition. Too many decent options in the vicinity to choose from!
However, the attempt to make up for a dismal room service pizza with the inclusion of sides of mayo, ketchup and mustard surprised even us!!!
